comment: * Listener used to get vendor-specific commands.

methods.name: void onReceived(int srcAddress, int destAddress, byte[] params, boolean hasVendorId)
methods.comment:
* Called when a vendor command is received.
         *
         * @param srcAddress source logical address
         * @param destAddress destination logical address
         * @param params vendor-specific parameters
         * @param hasVendorId {@code true} if the command is <Vendor Command
         *        With ID>. The first 3 bytes of params is vendor id.

methods.name: void onControlStateChanged(boolean enabled, int reason)
methods.comment:
* The callback is called: *
    *
  • before HdmiControlService is disabled. *
  • after HdmiControlService is enabled and the local address is assigned. *
* The client shouldn't hold the thread too long since this is a blocking call. * * @param enabled {@code true} if HdmiControlService is enabled. * @param reason the reason code why the state of HdmiControlService is changed. * @see #CONTROL_STATE_CHANGED_REASON_START * @see #CONTROL_STATE_CHANGED_REASON_SETTING * @see #CONTROL_STATE_CHANGED_REASON_WAKEUP * @see #CONTROL_STATE_CHANGED_REASON_STANDBY

methodNames: void onReceived(int srcAddress, int destAddress, byte[] params, boolean hasVendorId)
